div.p:
Â
On March 3 part of the 8th grade class attended a Career Day at State Tech. They were able to learn about careers in construction, computer programing, transportation, and automotive.Â
Â

a.aria-label: Read more about STATE TECH CAREER DAY PICS

div.p:
Â
Â
Students developed a 3D model of the Oregon Trail, and then created "covered wagons" to drive over the trail. SpherosÂ (robotic spheres) were used to power their covered wagons.Â Students learned how to code the Spheros, and worked through the design process to develop a covered wagon that would work with the Spheros. Students used materials such as cardboard, tape, legos, knex, and water to . . .

div.p:
Â
Winter weather can cause many challenges for school operations.Â The district has the option to use various methods to mitigate such challenges.
1.Â Delayed or Late Start
2. Snow Routes/Hard Surface Only
3. Early DismissalÂ
Below is information related to delayed/late start for the school day and snow routes/hard surface only routes for school buses.Â Please review both . . .
